name: Sniper Shoot Crime
description:
Sniper Shoot Crime is a stealthy fps counter game and city shoot game packed with non-stop action of enemy strike, alertness, hostility and crisis. You are appointed on a critical mission in combat battlefield strike, make this war your last war and protect your entire nation from terrorists. Use your shooting experience, fighting experience and blood experience fight against these deadly gangsters.

Features:
- Smooth touch controls.
- Crime city environment.
- Sniper shooting from top.
- HQ Weapons
- Realistic effects
Download and enjoy now
